title: ion-col
body: Columns are cellular components of the
system and go inside of a

.
They will expand to fill their row. All content within a grid should go inside of a column.
By default, columns will stretch to fill the entire height of the row. Columns are
that can be applied to a column to customize this behavior.

props.name: offset
props.docs: The amount to offset the column, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the end of the total available.

props.name: offsetLg
props.docs: The amount to offset the column for lg screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the end of the total available.

props.name: offsetMd
props.docs: The amount to offset the column for md screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the end of the total available.

props.name: offsetSm
props.docs: The amount to offset the column for sm screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the end of the total available.

props.name: offsetXl
props.docs: The amount to offset the column for xl screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the end of the total available.

props.name: offsetXs
props.docs: The amount to offset the column for xs screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the end of the total available.

props.name: pull
props.docs: The amount to pull the column, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the start of the total available.

props.name: pullLg
props.docs: The amount to pull the column for lg screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the start of the total available.

props.name: pullMd
props.docs: The amount to pull the column for md screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the start of the total available.

props.name: pullSm
props.docs: The amount to pull the column for sm screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the start of the total available.

props.name: pullXl
props.docs: The amount to pull the column for xl screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the start of the total available.

props.name: pullXs
props.docs: The amount to pull the column for xs screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the start of the total available.

props.name: push
props.docs: The amount to push the column, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the end of the total available.

props.name: pushLg
props.docs: The amount to push the column for lg screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the end of the total available.

props.name: pushMd
props.docs: The amount to push the column for md screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the end of the total available.

props.name: pushSm
props.docs: The amount to push the column for sm screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the end of the total available.

props.name: pushXl
props.docs: The amount to push the column for xl screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the end of the total available.

props.name: pushXs
props.docs: The amount to push the column for xs screens, in terms of how many columns it should shift to the end of the total available.

props.name: size
props.docs: The size of the column, in terms of how many columns it should take up out of the total available. If "auto" is passed, the column will be the size of its content.

props.name: sizeLg
props.docs: The size of the column for lg screens, in terms of how many columns it should take up out of the total available. If "auto" is passed, the column will be the size of its content.

props.name: sizeMd
props.docs: The size of the column for md screens, in terms of how many columns it should take up out of the total available. If "auto" is passed, the column will be the size of its content.

props.name: sizeSm
props.docs: The size of the column for sm screens, in terms of how many columns it should take up out of the total available. If "auto" is passed, the column will be the size of its content.

props.name: sizeXl
props.docs: The size of the column for xl screens, in terms of how many columns it should take up out of the total available. If "auto" is passed, the column will be the size of its content.

props.name: sizeXs
props.docs: The size of the column for xs screens, in terms of how many columns it should take up out of the total available. If "auto" is passed, the column will be the size of its content.

docs:
Columns are cellular components of the [grid](../grid) system and go inside of a [row](../row).
They will expand to fill their row. All content within a grid should go inside of a column.

See [Grid Layout](/docs/layout/grid) for more information.

styles.docs: The number of total Columns in the Grid
